explains: n. 自由化；自由主义化；放宽限制
wordGroup: bourgeois liberalization [法]资产阶级自由化

sentences.en: The deal is one of the first fruits of a liberalization of foreign investment law.
sentences.cn: 这项交易是外国投资法放宽后的首批成果之一。

sentences.en: Authorities are now clearly alarmed that Banks have taken the liberalization moves too far.
sentences.cn: 管理机构现在显然对银行过度自由化拉响了警报。

sentences.en: Liberalization of interest rates in the primary government debt market would be an essential prerequisite.
sentences.cn: 可是国债发行利率的自由化是一个关键的前提条件。
